$comment: The condition is trying to make sure that there is no separately mapped elevator door by excluding the question if another door with elevator-door-like properties is on the same footway as the elevator. It also excludes children of the elevator object in case the door is mapped as a node on the elevator way.

The condition is trying to make sure that there is no separately mapped elevator door by excluding the question if another door with elevator-door-like properties is on the same footway as the elevator. It also excludes children of the elevator object in case the door is mapped as a node on the elevator way.

According to the OSM wiki, 'crossing=traffic_signals' should be tagged, if traffic signals are present. Hence, if 'crossing' has any other value, one can assume that 'crossing:signals=no', because 'traffic_signals' takes precedence over the other values.
